Json Parsing

Parse

The simplest scenario is the convertion of a string to the Json data type. We provide a set of library functions that help parse and use the result.

Parse.parse

Using scalaz.Validation to capture the success or failure of the operation: 




Parse.parseWith




For convenience we can handle the success and failure cases directly:










Parse.parseOr






Parse.parseOption




If you are not concerned with errors, you can parse directly to an option.








Decode




A more likely scenario then parsing directly to json
is you want to parse and then decode. The following
is a set of functions




Parse.decode




Parse.decodeWith



Parse.decodeWithEither



Parse.decodeWithNel



Parse.decodeOr



Parse.decodeOption









String Implicits
